title: Rothkugel-Geheimnis der Wahren Raumfahrt-Secret Space Program(20
description:
For english-only speaking:
This book is in german language. English title would be: The Secret of Real Space Explorations - The Secret Space Program (2004). Klaus-Peter Rothkugel's banned and mindboggling installment of original research into power groups and super technology behind the real and absolutely secret space program from 3rd Reich onwards. From rocket-driven to electrogravitic saucer designs and their possible use for space explorations with sinister political agendas behind it. Contains probably the best material that is available on this topic. Together with 2-part book, the archive also includes additional bonus material, a short SF novel and a web compilation of odd pictures taken from space. Over 1000 pages, many pictures. A must read for everyone.

Fur Deutschsprachige:
Klaus-Peter Rothkugel's verbotenes Fortsetzungsband zum ersten Buch (Das Geheimnis der deutschen Flugscheiben). Die wichtigsten elektromagnetischen Antriebe ("Electrostatic Propulsion", "Thermionic Propulsion", "Electron Impact", "Dipolar Force Field Propulsion", Plasma-Antriebe, "MHD-By-Pass" und "Magnetic Energy Propulsion") werden detailliert besprochen (basierend auf offizielle, zumeist US-amerikanische Patent-Dokumente).
